Comment: I am pretty sure Trump doesn't know what "photoshopped" even means based on this exchange:  TRUMP: Oh, and you think it was Photoshop. Well --  TERRY MORAN: Here we go. Here we go.  TRUMP: -- don't Photoshop it. Go look --  TERRY MORAN: Alright.  "Don't photoshop it, go look" is not a sentence that makes sense in any context except one where the person uttering it is entirely ignorant of how that works.
